text: Torino is an album by the UK band Cinerama. It was released on July 2, 2002, on Manifesto Records. ==Track listing== All tracks composed by David Gedge and Simon Cleave # "And When She Was Bad" – 2:53 # "Two Girls" – 2:43 # "Estrella" – 3:15 # "Cat Girl Tights" – 5:03 # "Airborne" – 2:06 # "Quick, Before It Melts" – 5:03 # "Tie Me Up" – 4:15 # "Careless" – 2:53 # "Close Up" – 4:17 # "Starry Eyed" – 2:54 # "Get Up and Go" – 4:24 # "Get Smart" – 3:31 # "Health and Efficiency" – 6:25 ==Personnel== ;Cinerama *David Gedge - vocals, guitar *Simon Cleave - guitar *Sally Murrell - keyboards, vocals *Terry de Castro - bass, vocals *Kari Paavola - drums ==References== Category:2002 albums Category:albums produced by Steve Albini
title: Torino (album)
